item.title: Made Wth Hugo
item.description: This site is made with a static site generator named hugo. Basic commands: installation brew install hugo start a new site: hugo new site blog cd blog add a theme git clone https://github.com/niklasbuschmann/contrast-hugo.git themes/contract-hugo add theme to config.yaml echo 'theme: "contrast-hugo"' >> config.yaml add your first post: hugo new posts/2020-05-27-my-first-post.md edit the contents of the post: vi content/posts/2020-05-27-my-first-post.md serve the contents of the directory hugo server -D finally generate static content to public directory
